Pre-Game Insights: The Pacers are 2-2 against division opponents.
The Bucks are 5-5 against the rest of the division.
The Pacers make 48.8% of their shots from the field this season, which is 3.5 percentage points higher than the Bucks have allowed to their opponents (45.3%).
The Bucks are shooting 47.8% from the field, 0.3% higher than the 47.5% the Pacers' opponents have shot this season.
